subject: Simsonn PLUS X Pedals
description_text:
Good morning,

Yesterday finally I tried to test the pedals! But unfortunately the
computer don't recognise it as a control... In the app everything works
well, but I can't use it on games because on the game controller menu it
doesn't give me the 3 axes... On Assetto Corsa I can't introduce the
pedals, it doesn't read.
Can you please help me?

Thank you!

Best regards,
Francisco
